pageContext.claim: “He [Sen. Jon Tester] will come home and tell you about your Second Amendment, then he'll vote for something where you knock the hell out of it.”
pageContext.analysis: Tester has an “A-” rating from the National Rifle Association. His website states, “As a gun owner, Jon has voted against legislation that would violate Montanans’ Second Amendment rights and hinder the ability of law-abiding citizens to purchase and own a gun.”
